com.java.GameEngine.log

Class LogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.GameEngine.log.LogManager

  • public class LogManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Log manager that can be used by the game developer to create log files.
    Author:
    Serkan Demirci

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears all data inside the log manager
      static LogManager getInstance()
      Returns the instance of the LogManager class
      int getLogLimit()
      Returns the maximum log limit that can be stored in the memory
      void log(java.lang.String parStr)
      Logs the message
      void logException(java.lang.String parStr)
      Logs message as Exception
      void logInfo(java.lang.String parStr)
      Logs message as Info
      void logWarning(java.lang.String parStr)
      Logs message as Warning
      void save(java.io.File parFile)
      Saves the contents of the log into a file.
      After method executed the log messages are deleted from memory.
      void setLogLimit(int parLimit)
      Sets the maximum log limit that can be stored in the memory.
